Sorceress Softcore Skill Distribution

Sorceress

Favored Trees (60 point investment):
    44.67% of Sorceresss favor Lightning Skills
    23.35% of Sorceresss favor Cold Skills
    15.23% of Sorceresss favor Fire Skills 		Hybrid Builds (35+ Points in each tree):
    23% invest in Cold Skills + Fire Skills
    4% invest in Fire Skills + Lightning Skills
    1% invest in Cold Skills + Lightning Skills
    <1% invest in all trees
